name: Rachel Amber
info:
• 简体中文名: 瑞秋·安伯
  • 别名: Rachel Dawn Amber
  • 别名: Rachel
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1994-07-22
  • 身高: 165cm
  • 体重: 50kg
  • 引用来源: Wikia
  • 出生地: 美国·加利佛尼亚州·长滩
detail: Rachel Dawn Amber was a student at Blackwell Academy. Prior to 2013, she began her attendance at Blackwell and met Arcadia Bay resident, Chloe Price. The two later formed a close friendship and planned to run away together to Los Angeles.

jobs.name: Life Is Strange: Before the Storm
